Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.itu.team7.game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a player with specified parameters and returns a shape when asked for.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 7: Mads Gade & Rene A. Nielsen
